text: læa brrda phu ma kxn hna phwk khea kdi ptiseth (sacthrrm ma læw) læa phwk khea (ku re chmak kah) midi mi thung hnung nı sib khxng thi rea di hı (khwam mangkhang) kæ phwk khea kranan k di phwk khea kdi ptiseth brrda rx sul khxng kha dangnan kar ptiseth (tx kha ca mi phl) pen xyangri (tx phwk khea)
